fr.upmc.alasca.requestgen.main

Class ClientArrivalConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.upmc.alasca.requestgen.main.ClientArrivalConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestArrivalI, ConnectorI, ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, RequiredI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ClientArrivalConnector
extends AbstractConnector
implements RequestArrivalI
    The class ClientArrivalConnector implements the connector between the outbound port of a component sending requests with the inbound port of another component servicing them.

    Description

    Simply pass the request to the offering inbound port.

    Invariant 

     invariant      true

    Created on : 3 sept. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
